position: Product Manager |  IIT Kharagpur Graduate | SDE Intern at Microsoft

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: •The object of the project was to create a cmdlet utility allowing internal partners tovalidate their query and in turn create Search Folders with appropriate items in themailbox provided by them.• My utility took the mailbox ID and the criteria from the crawl settings provided by thepartners and returned the item count for partners to verify.• Once the query was validated through the utility, the mailbox and criteria wereon-boarded in the crawlers for crawling. This would save enormous time, resources, andefforts of partners and assistants.
experience.description_html: •The object of the project was to create a cmdlet utility allowing internal partners tovalidate their query and in turn create Search Folders with appropriate items in themailbox provided by them.• My utility took the mailbox ID and the criteria from the crawl settings provided by thepartners and returned the item count for partners to verify.• Once the query was validated through the utility, the mailbox and criteria wereon-boarded in the crawlers for crawling. This would save enormous time, resources, andefforts of partners and assistants.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Surface Action-Oriented Individual Specific Notification on TeamsThe overall project consisted of sending automated notifications to Field sellers regarding the breach in the pipeline hygiene on teams. My work Included:1) Working on Azure Function which gets automatically triggered on receiving a message in bus topic/subscription and posting the message on BOT API endpoint.2) Working on Adaptive cards which can be surfaced on Microsoft Teams, Outlook, external mails, UWP App.3) working on simple dialog bot containing basic functionalities which was later integrated with the main bot .

My work Included:1) Working on Azure Function which gets automatically triggered on receiving a message in bus topic/subscription and posting the message on BOT API endpoint.2) Working on Adaptive cards which can be surfaced on Microsoft Teams, Outlook, external mails, UWP App.3) working on simple dialog bot containing basic functionalities which was later integrated with the main bot .

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Proposed A/B testing mechanism and designed the KPI framework with the aid of Google Analytics. Contributed to building a knowledge tree which was the foundation of the K12 project aimed at revolutionising the way knowledge ﬂows from one standard to another. Developed a Naive Bayes + Fasttext ensemble model for subject classiﬁcation
